title: Chapter 1658 - The World-Suppressing Seal
body:
Chapter 1658 - The World-Suppressing Seal

There were pairs of True Immortals from the Church of All Spirits stationed around the walls of Blazing Firmament Immortal City at regular intervals, and the sky over the ancient city was completely covered in a massive formation.

“Even Immortal Lords will be instantly reduced to puddles of blood if they try to force their way through the Divine Capital Blood Transformation Formation. There’s no need to worry. Come on, have a drink!”

“Heh heh, you’re right! And in the face of the Church of All Spirits’ prestige, who’d be dumb enough to throw their lives away?” 

Two Void Realm True Immortals of the Church of All Spirits sat cross-legged on a stretch of wall, sharing a drink. One was a thin-faced man in yellow. His companion was a stalwart middle-aged man with blood-red hair.

“That’s not all. We’ve got His Excellency Ming Xing with us to oversee this operation. Even other Immortal Kings have to treat him with respect.”

“Strange. Just what’s going on to warrant His Excellency Ming Xing’s personal involvement?”

“Who knows? There’s no understanding how a top expert like him thinks, so let’s not waste our time trying.”

When they spoke...
